What future direction does the paper sug: Comprehensive integration of AI methods to address binding affinity and developability aspects.
Exclusive reliance on experimental methods for antibody design.
Focusing solely on the stability of antibody mimetics without considering other factors.
Developing antibody mimetics without the use of computational tools.
What is a significant challenge in prote: Accurate prediction of protein-protein interactions due to complex electrostatic interactions.
Limited availability of high-quality protein crystal structures.
Inability to simulate protein folding in real-time.
High computational cost of simulating large protein complexes.
What is the primary focus of the paper ': The integration of AI and ML techniques in designing antibody mimetics.
The clinical applications of antibody mimetics in treating SARS-CoV-2.
The historical development of antibody mimetics over the past decade.
The economic impact of antibody mimetics on the pharmaceutical industry.
What role does ESM play in the context o: ESM is used to design nanobody binders by predicting mutations in the virus that affect binding sites.
ESM is used to sequence the entire genome of SARS-CoV-2 for vaccine development.
ESM is applied to enhance the immune response of patients infected with SARS-CoV-2.
ESM is utilized to develop antiviral drugs targeting the SARS-CoV-2 RNA polymerase.
